title: Medidata Rave Web Services
description: Medidata is innovating with a growing number of software providers committed to driving efficiencies in clinical research for sponsors. The Medidata Rave Web Services API enables technologists to quickly, independently and cost-effectively integrate their existing systems with Medidata RaveÂ® and our platform to create a seamless clinical research environment with real-time, inbound and outbound data sharing using CDISC* data standards.
